name: Chocolate Sorbet
author: lutzflcat
summary: Indulgent, intense, dark chocolate flavor that will satisfy any chocolate lover.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons brewed espresso or strong coffee
directions: Mix sugar, cocoa powder, and sea salt in a large saucepan
Stir in water, espresso, and almond extract
Bring to a boil over medium heat
Once the sugar has dissolved and mixture is smooth, remove from heat and stir in the coffee liqueur
Transfer mixture to a bowl, cover, and chill completely in the refrigerator or using an ice bath
Pour mixture into an ice cream maker and churn until slightly thickened according to manufacturer's instructions, about 20 minutes
Transfer mixture to an airtight container and freeze until firm enough to scoop, 3 to 4 hours or overnight
